title: Tomato Bruschetta with Spinach Pesto
ingredients: ['225g French baguette', '50g spinach leaves, rinsed and torn', '40g Parmesan cheese, grated', '500g almonds, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '175g tomatoes, chopped', '2 tablespoons thinly sliced spring onions']
